TheLibrarian:Curiosity.NAME: Curiosity
TheLibrarian:Curiosity.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, NL then draw cards equal to your thelibrarian:Anthology.

TheLibrarian:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
TheLibrarian:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

TheLibrarian:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
TheLibrarian:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
TheLibrarian:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

TheLibrarian:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
TheLibrarian:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

TheLibrarian:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
TheLibrarian:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !TheLibrarian:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

TheLibrarian:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
TheLibrarian:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !TheLibrarian:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

TheLibrarian:SkimCollection.NAME: Skim Collection
TheLibrarian:SkimCollection.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Anthology:Costs [E] less.
TheLibrarian:SkimCollection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL Anthology:Costs [E] less.

TheLibrarian:EmptyBook.NAME: Empty Book
TheLibrarian:EmptyBook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain an additional card reward at the end of combat.

TheLibrarian:HeartOfAspiration.NAME: Heart Of Aspiration
TheLibrarian:HeartOfAspiration.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL This is a placeholder effect.

TheLibrarian:FariesCare.NAME: Fairies' Care
TheLibrarian:FariesCare.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 plus thelibrarian:Anthology Regen. NL This is a placeholder effect.

TheLibrarian:OpenedCanofWellCheers.NAME: Opened Can of WellCheers
TheLibrarian:OpenedCanofWellCheers.DESCRIPTION: Get a potion. Exhaust. NL thelibrarian:Anthology: Get an additional choice of potion.

TheLibrarian:BarrierOfVines.NAME: Barrier of Vines
TheLibrarian:BarrierOfVines.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to All enemies.

TheLibrarian:DreamOfABlackSwan.NAME: Dream of a Black Swan
TheLibrarian:DreamOfABlackSwan.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength, Dexterity, and Metallicize. Shuffle 6 Brothers into your Discard.

TheLibrarian:DOBSHardyBrother.NAME: A Hardy Brother
TheLibrarian:DOBSHardyBrother.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Metallicize. NL Draw a Card. NL Exhaust.

TheLibrarian:DOBSQuickBrother.NAME: A Quick Brother
TheLibrarian:DOBSQuickBrother.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Dexterity. NL Draw a Card. NL Exhaust.

TheLibrarian:DOBSStrongBrother.NAME: A Strong Brother
TheLibrarian:DOBSStrongBrother.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Strength. NL Draw a Card. NL Exhaust.

TheLibrarian:Penitence.NAME: Penitence
TheLibrarian:Penitence.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Status or Curse card, gain !M! block.

TheLibrarian:MountainOfCorpses.NAME: Mountain of Corpses
TheLibrarian:MountainOfCorpses.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your discard pile. NL For every 5 cards exhausted, gain !M! health and Strength.

TheLibrarian:DropBookcase.NAME: Drop Bookcase
TheLibrarian:DropBookcase.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thelibrarian:Anthology: Do it Again.

TheLibrarian:Goodbye.NAME: GOODBYE
TheLibrarian:Goodbye.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

TheLibrarian:Noise.NAME: Noise
TheLibrarian:Noise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

TheLibrarian:FullStopOffice.NAME: Full Stop
TheLibrarian:FullStopOffice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage, Inflict 1 Weak NL thelibrarian:Invitation (4 Attacks): Inflict 2 Weak

TheLibrarian:MemoriesOfApril23rd.NAME: Memories Of April 23rd
TheLibrarian:MemoriesOfApril23rd.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, play !M! attack that you played this combat (WIP).
TheLibrarian:MemoriesOfApril23rd.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, play !M! attacks that you played this combat (WIP).

TheLibrarian:DistortedBlade.NAME: Distorted Blade
TheLibrarian:DistortedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL thelibrarian:Invitation (3 Attacks, 3 Skills, 1 Power): Then deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies.

TheLibrarian:AlertStrike.NAME: Alert Strike
TheLibrarian:AlertStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL thelibrarian:Anthology Inflict !M! Vulnerable.

TheLibrarian:Clone.NAME: Clone
TheLibrarian:Clone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Copy a card in your hand.

TheLibrarian:HappyMemories.NAME: Happy Memories
TheLibrarian:HappyMemories.DESCRIPTION: For each enemy, gain !B! block and !M! Plated Armor.

TheLibrarian:CombatPrep.NAME: Combat Preparation
TheLibrarian:CombatPrep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL At the start of your next turn, Gain 1 [E].

TheLibrarian:DaCapoAlFine.NAME: Da Capo Al Fine
TheLibrarian:DaCapoAlFine.DESCRIPTION: If the size of your draw pile is equal to or less than your thelibrarian:Anthology, Take another turn after this one and end the turn.

TheLibrarian:FourthMatchFlame.NAME: Fourth Match Flame
TheLibrarian:FourthMatchFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then shuffle a Burn and a copy of this card into your draw pile. NL Repeat for every burn in your draw pile. Exhaust.

TheLibrarian:TrashDisposal.NAME: Trash Disposal
TheLibrarian:TrashDisposal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 6 times. thelibrarian:Invitation (3 Skills): Gain !M! Strength for this turn before attacking.

TheLibrarian:Schadenfreude.NAME: Schadenfreude
TheLibrarian:Schadenfreude.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain thorns. (WIP)

TheLibrarian:WillOfThePrescript.NAME: Will Of The Prescript
TheLibrarian:WillOfThePrescript.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thelibrarian:Invitation (3 Attacks, 3 Skills): Draw 2 cards, and Draw 2 Additional Cards next turn.

TheLibrarian:RainbowRush.NAME: Rainbow Rush
TheLibrarian:RainbowRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage at all enemies. NL Innate, Ethereal

TheLibrarian:RipSpace.NAME: Rip Space
TheLibrarian:RipSpace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Deal !M! more damage each time.

TheLibrarian:SteamTransportMachine.NAME: Steam Transport Machine
TheLibrarian:SteamTransportMachine.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, after you draw your hand, draw a card you have the least of.

TheLibrarian:FerventAdoration.NAME: Fervent Adoration
TheLibrarian:FerventAdoration.DESCRIPTION: Force an enemy to use it's intent on ALL enemies.

TheLibrarian:Lamp.NAME: Lamp
TheLibrarian:Lamp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each attacking enemy, then change the intent of all enemies to attack.

TheLibrarian:AttentionAndFocus.NAME: Attention and Focus
TheLibrarian:AttentionAndFocus.DESCRIPTION: If no attacks were played this turn, gain 20 block, then lose 10 strength for the turn. NL Otherwise, gain 6 block.

TheLibrarian:Coffin.NAME: Coffin
TheLibrarian:Coffin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Multiply that by !M! if the target is weakened or vulnerable.

TheLibrarian:SevenBullets.NAME: Seven Bullets
TheLibrarian:SevenBullets.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle seven bullets into your deck. Deal 5 damage to every enemy on drawing one. On drawing the seventh...

TheLibrarian:SBBullet.NAME: A Bullet
TheLibrarian:SBBullet.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. On Draw, exhaust and deal 5 damage to all enemies, then increase the damage of the rest of the bullets by 5.

TheLibrarian:Lament.NAME: Lament
TheLibrarian:Lament.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies, then apply !M! weak to all enemies.

TheLibrarian:TokenOfFriendship.NAME: Token Of Friendship
TheLibrarian:TokenOfFriendship.DESCRIPTION: Add a Pebble to your hand. When you draw a status, heal !M!.

TheLibrarian:Scars.NAME: Scars
TheLibrarian:Scars.DESCRIPTION: thelibrarian:Anthology: When you take health damage, gain !M! block next turn.

TheLibrarian:Regret.NAME: Regret
TheLibrarian:Regret.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.

TheLibrarian:TOFPebble.NAME: Pebble
TheLibrarian:TOFPebble.DESCRIPTION: Lose your Friendship. Exhaust. If this card would be discarded, instead place it on the top of your Draw Pile.

TheLibrarian:EmptyHeartedAxe.NAME: Empty-Hearted Axe
TheLibrarian:EmptyHeartedAxe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage minus !M! for each !E! you have.

TheLibrarian:Spores.NAME: Spores
TheLibrarian:Spores.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, inflict !M! damage and poison on the attacker.
